front.title: IEEE Guide for the Evaluation of the Reliability of HVDC Converter Stations

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Reaffirmed March 2012. This guide is intended to serve high-voltage direct current (HVDC) converter station reliability by suggesting significant objectives, design, operation, monitoring, and specification details. This guide includes the CIGRE performance protocol and reliability-related mathematical concepts.
